subject: Re: [nihontostudy]
msgSnippet: Thanks.  A guy I know just got hosed for 235.00 for the katana and a Masa Hide tanto. Sent him half payment. Anyone had any luck with this dude? Bob Elder
messageBody:
Thanks. A guy I know just got hosed for 235.00 for
the katana and a Masa Hide tanto. Sent him half
payment. Anyone had any luck with this dude? Bob Elder
